title: (LFM) Support
body:
Nesting Blue are looking for a support!

We are looking for a support.

Must have good communication.

Needs to be available straight away.

Must have good knowledge of ADC/Supp synergies.

Must know when to roam and when not to.

---------------------------

Current Rank:

Highest Rank Achieved:

Top 5 Support Champs:

What do you want from a team:

Please leave your answers in the comments

replies.body:
Current Rank: Bronze 3 but have gold/plat normals mmr (ranked promos screwed me)

Highest Rank Achieved: have trained with a challenger 5s team to improve (team challenged) but was Silver last season, but norms mmr matches with gold and plat

Top 5 Support Champs: {{champion:223}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:53}} 

What do you want from a team: looking for a serious ranked team for s6. can be a mid lane fill in.  really keen to play for a serious ranked team.  im honest and hard working and will put my hand up and admit a mistake and learn from it.  add me ign "sprattyy"

Current Rank: Gold 4 

Highest Rank: the same maybe gold 3 partway though season took a break so dont remember

Top 5 Support Champs: {{champion:53}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:1}} 

What do you want from a team: Im looking for a semi serious or serious ranked team to progress with but still able to have a laugh im 21 so prefer to play with people that can handle there emotions Add me in game as i dont check the forums to often

Current Rank: Bronze 3 but in a gold 5 ranked 5s team meaning I am very knowledgeable about ranked 5s

Highest Rank Achieved: Bronze 3

Top 5 Support Champs:{{champion:201}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:111}} But I can play every supp to an extent.

What do you want from a team: I prefer to phrase it as what can I add to a ranked team? I have a very large champion pool (basically every supp) and I am very knowledgeable about different team comps. I am also quite good at communicating with team members.

Current Rank: Silver 4

Highest Rank Achieved: Silver 3

Top 5 Support Champs: Thresh, Leona, Morgana,  Blitzcrank, Annie

What do you want from a team: I'm looking for a dedicated team that wants to build their knowledge of the game and strengthen relationships with team members.

Current Rank: silver 5 (just got out of bronze)

Highest Rank Achieved: silver 2 in season 3

Top 5 Support Champs: {{champion:412}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:26}} 

What do you want from a team: i want to climb up higher ranks to find even stronger people to beat.
